Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring procedurally generated worlds, real-time multiplayer interaction, and extensive vehicle customization. Players can mine resources, build structures, trade with others, and discover teleporters while managing fuel and vehicle health. The game includes a shop system for upgrades, cloud synchronization across devices, and cross-platform support with mobile controls. Built with HTML5 Canvas, WebSockets/MQTT for networking, and IndexedDB for local storage.
